* You need to have an available container image repository service to store the container images generated by the build. For more information, please refer to the link:https://docs.docker.com/registry/[Docker Official Documentation].

* You need to create a Secret in advance within the project to store the image repository service information. For more information, please refer to xref:07-project-management/05-configuration/01-secrets/01-create-a-secret.adoc[Create a Secret].
